CHAT.comment: LEGAL SERVICES CORP., Petitioner v. VELAZQUEZ; UNITED STATES, Petitioner v. VELAZQUEZ
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ALAN LEVINE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER LEGAL SERVICE CORPORATION
ORAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER UNITED STATES
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BURT NEUBORNE ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF EDWIN S. KNEEDLER ON BEHALF OF PETITIONER UNITED STATES
(Whereupon, at 12:05 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
